attributes.action: give an alternative search option to full body scanners at airports
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Full body scanners are being introduced to every airport in the UK.  There is no alternative to using the scanners despite the implications for people's privacy.  The UK government should introduce the option of a full body pat-down search instead of the full body scanner like in airports in the USA.
